Package neqsim.fluidmechanics.geometrydefinitions.internalgeometry.wall

Class MaterialLayer

java.lang.Object
neqsim.fluidmechanics.geometrydefinitions.internalgeometry.wall.MaterialLayer
public class MaterialLayer extends Object
Represents a single material layer in a pipe wall or vessel wall.

Each layer has thermal properties (conductivity, density, heat capacity) and geometric properties (thickness). Layers can be created from predefined PipeMaterial types or with custom properties.

Property Units:

  • Thickness: meters [m]
  • Conductivity: W/(m·K)
  • Density: kg/m³
  • Specific heat capacity (Cp): J/(kg·K)
  • Temperature: Kelvin [K]
Version:
$Id: $Id
Author:
ESOL

      public PipeMaterial getPipeMaterial()
      Gets the PipeMaterial enum if this layer was created from one.
      Returns:

    • getHeatTransferCoefficient

      public double getHeatTransferCoefficient()
      Calculates the planar (flat wall) heat transfer coefficient.

      For a flat wall: h = k / t

      Returns:
      Heat transfer coefficient in W/(m²·K)

    • getThermalResistance

      public double getThermalResistance()
      Calculates the thermal resistance for planar (flat wall) geometry.

      R = t / k [m²·K/W]

      Returns:
      Thermal resistance in m²·K/W

    • getCylindricalThermalResistance

      public double getCylindricalThermalResistance(double innerRadius)
      Calculates the thermal resistance for cylindrical geometry.

      R = ln(r_outer/r_inner) / (2π * k * L)

      Per unit length: R' = ln(r_outer/r_inner) / (2π * k) [K·m/W]

      Parameters:
      innerRadius - Inner radius in meters
      Returns:
      Thermal resistance per unit length in K·m/W

    • getThermalDiffusivity

      public double getThermalDiffusivity()
      Calculates the thermal diffusivity.

      α = k / (ρ * Cp)

      Returns:
      Thermal diffusivity in m²/s

    • getThermalMassPerArea

      public double getThermalMassPerArea()
      Calculates the thermal mass per unit area.

      m * Cp = ρ * t * Cp [J/(m²·K)]

      Returns:
      Thermal mass per unit area in J/(m²·K)

    • isInsulation

      public boolean isInsulation()
      Checks if this material is an insulation (k < 0.1 W/(m·K)).
      Returns:
      true if this is an insulation material

    • isMetal

      public boolean isMetal()
      Checks if this material is a metal (k > 10 W/(m·K)).
      Returns:
      true if this is a metallic material
